tool_description: Skyscanner API allows users to search best flights and hotels with details and best price. This API has all needed by any developer to create a new application with some extended features.
name: Skyscanner_v2
title: Skyscanner

api_list.name: Get Similar Hotels
api_list.description: Get all the similar hotels based on the selected hotel.

required_parameters.name: hotelId
required_parameters.description: **Hotel ID** can be retrieved from **Search Hotel** or **Get Hotel Details** API in **Hotels** collection.

required_parameters.name: adults
required_parameters.description: Number of adult guests (with age 18 and over)

required_parameters.name: checkin
required_parameters.description:
Checkin Date
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

required_parameters.name: checkout
required_parameters.description:
Checkout Date
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: price
optional_parameters.description:
**total** - Total price for the stay.
**per**   - Price per night

optional_parameters.name: waitTime
optional_parameters.description: Wait time in milliseconds. Sometimes the API needs **wait times** or more than **one** API call to get **complete data**.

optional_parameters.name: stars
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **star** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: maxPrice
optional_parameters.description: Maximum cost filter to stay in the hotel.

optional_parameters.name: minPrice
optional_parameters.description: Minimum cost filter to stay in the hotel.

optional_parameters.name: mealPlan
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **mealPlan** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: searchId
optional_parameters.description: **searchId** can be retrieved from **Search Hotel** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: guestType
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **guestType** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: chain
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **chain** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: amenities
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **amenities** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: discounts
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **discounts** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: propertyType
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **propertyType** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: rating
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **rating** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: cancellation
optional_parameters.description: The Hotel **cancellation** filter range is retrievable from the **Get Hotel Filters** API in **Hotels** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **market** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **currencies** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

api_list.name: Search Flights Filter By Agent Id
api_list.description: Get and poll all flights, search between origin and destination with prices, filter, sorting for specific agent id.

required_parameters.name: destination
required_parameters.description: Destination airport **IATA** code. The **IATA** code can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: Origin airport **IATA** code. The **IATA** code can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
Return date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description: Number of Childrens (with age between 2-12 years)

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Number of Adults (with age 18 and over)
Default Value: 1

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description: Number of Infants (with age < 2 years)

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **currencies** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **market** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

api_list.name: Search Flights Multi Stops
api_list.description: Get and poll all flights. Searching the flights between multiple locations with prices, filter, sorting etc.

required_parameters.name: legs
required_parameters.description:
The legs must contain the **origin**, **destination** and **date** in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
  {
    'origin': 'LOND',
    'destination': 'NYCA',
    'date': '2023-02-07'
  },
  ...
]
**Note:** If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects on the board.

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description: Number of Infants (with age < 2 years)

optional_parameters.name: waitTime
optional_parameters.description: Wait time in milliseconds. Sometimes the API needs **wait times** or more than **one** API call to get **complete data**.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **market** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description: Number of Childrens (with age between 2-12 years)

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Number of Adults (with age 18 and over)
Default Value: 1

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **currencies** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

api_list.name: Search Cars
api_list.description: Use this API for searching the cars for hire based on location.

required_parameters.name: pickUpEntityId
required_parameters.description: **pickUpEntityId** can be retrieved from **Search Location** API in **Cars** collection as **entity_id**

required_parameters.name: pickUpDate
required_parameters.description: Pick Up Date

required_parameters.name: pickUpTime
required_parameters.description: Pick Up Time

optional_parameters.name: dropOffEntityId
optional_parameters.description: **dropOffEntityId** can be retrieved from **Search Location** API  in **Cars** collection **entity_id**

optional_parameters.name: dropOffTime
optional_parameters.description: Drop Off Time

optional_parameters.name: driverAge
optional_parameters.description: Driver's age (21 years and over)

optional_parameters.name: dropOffDate
optional_parameters.description: Drop Off Date

optional_parameters.name: waitTime
optional_parameters.description: Wait time in milliseconds. Sometimes the API needs **wait times** or more than **one** API call to get **complete data**.

api_list.name: Search Location
api_list.description: Use this API to get EntityId for the pickup and drop location.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Location name for pickup/drop off.

api_list.name: Get Things To Do

required_parameters.description: **lat** can be retrieved from **Hotel Details** or **Search Hotel** API in **Hotels** collection as **latitude**.

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: **lng** can be retrieved from **Hotel Details** or **Search Hotel** API in **Hotels** collection as **longitude**.

optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

api_list.name: Search Flights
api_list.description: Get and poll all flights, search between origin and destination with prices, filter, sorting.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: Origin airport **IATA** code. The **IATA** code can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: destination
required_parameters.description: Destination airport **IATA** code. The **IATA** code can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description: Number of Infants (with age < 2 years)

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
Return date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Number of Adults (with age 18 and over)
Default Value: 1

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **currencies** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description: Number of Childrens (with age between 2-12 years)

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **market** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

api_list.name: Get Flight Details
api_list.description: Get all the details of the fights based on a unique Id.

required_parameters.name: legs
required_parameters.description:
The legs must contain the **origin**, **destination** and **date** in object format and must be passed in an array.
EXAMPLE:
[
  {
    'origin': 'LOND',
    'destination': 'NYCA',
    'date': '2023-02-07'
  },
  ...
]
**Note:** If there are multiple stops, there should be more leg objects on the board. And the legs have to be the same as the **Search Flights** API in **Flight** collection.

required_parameters.name: itineraryId
required_parameters.description: **itineraryId** can be retrieved from **Search Flights** API in **Flight** collection as **id**.

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description: Number of Childrens (with age between 2-12 years)

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **market** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description:
Number of Adults (with age 18 and over)
Default Value: 1

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **currencies** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: infants
optional_parameters.description: Number of Infants (with age < 2 years)

api_list.name: Search Flight Everywhere
api_list.description: Use this API to get flights when the destination is everywhere or unsure.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: Origin airport **IATA** code. The **IATA** code can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

optional_parameters.name: oneWay
optional_parameters.description: Send **oneWay** as **true** when you are unsure of the return date.

optional_parameters.name: anytime
optional_parameters.description: Send **anytime** as **true** when you are unsure of the trip date.

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
Return date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

Note: If **anytime** is **true**, you do not need to pass **returnDate**.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **currencies** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **market** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: travelDate
optional_parameters.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

Note: If **anytime** is **true**, you do not need to pass **travelDate**.

api_list.name: Search Flight Everywhere Details
api_list.description: Get all the details of the fights based on a unique Id.

required_parameters.name: origin
required_parameters.description: Origin airport **IATA** code. The **IATA** code can be extracted from the **Search Airport** API in the **Flights** collection.

required_parameters.name: CountryId
required_parameters.description: The **CountryId** can be extracted from the **Search Flight Everywhere** API in the **Flights** collection.

optional_parameters.name: returnDate
optional_parameters.description:
Return date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

Note: If **anytime** is **true**, you do not need to pass **returnDate**.

optional_parameters.name: oneWay
optional_parameters.description: Send **oneWay** as **true** when you are unsure of the return date.

optional_parameters.name: market
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **market** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: anytime
optional_parameters.description: Send **anytime** as **true** when you are unsure of the trip date.

optional_parameters.name: travelDate
optional_parameters.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

Note: If **anytime** is **true**, you do not need to pass **travelDate**.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **currencies** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

optional_parameters.name: countryCode
optional_parameters.description: The list of available **countryCode** can be retrieved through the **Get Config** API in the **Config** collection.

api_list.name: Test API
api_list.description: This API is to test if server is up and running
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skyscanner50.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skyscanner50.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://skyscanner50.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/test"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skyscanner50.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Config
api_list.description: This API endpoint is responsible for providing  some of the parameters require for most of the API's.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://skyscanner50.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getConfig"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "skyscanner50.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://skyscanner50.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/getConfig"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Airport
api_list.description: This API endpoint is responsible for providing a list of Airports for the location.
